com.demshape.factorization.model

Class Bpr

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.demshape.factorization.model.Factorization
      • com.demshape.factorization.model.Bpr

  • public class Bpr
extends Factorization
    An alternative learning function which uses the BPR objective. See 'BPR: Bayesian Personalized Ranking from Implicit Feedback'
